Name: Cool People Club
About the game: Cool People Club is a 3D Bullet Hell Adventure. STORY Plate, Duck, and Sock come across a Cool Contest - a contest in which the winner is granted a wish. However, the winner of this contest is determined by combat, and our heroes might just be in over their heads. Are you cool enough to lead them to victory? FEATURES Play as 3 different characters, each with their own attacks & quirks. Encounter many foes with unique attacks, projectiles, and styles. Fight powerful bosses. Earn cool badges. Choose your fate...
